SEARCH
Package client.view

Class TurnView

java.lang.Object
client.view.TurnView
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class TurnView extends Object implements Serializable
This Class represents a not modifiable copy of the GameModel which is sent to the RemoteClients following any type of change made on the GameModel or one of its components.
